title: The Zeitginning of the Trend 2/28: Cookies & Cream, Putin, FIFA, Clever, NBA, The Batman
itunes:title: The Zeitginning of the Trend 2/28: Cookies & Cream, Putin, FIFA, Clever, NBA, The Batman
description:
In this edition of The Zeitginning of the Trend, Jack and Miles discuss the best ice cream flavors, Putin "huddling" with officials, FIFA banning Russia from qualifying for the World Cup, a "clever trick" cut back on social media, NBA news, and reviews for "The Batman"!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
